code: import axios from"axios";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Users=()=>{const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('https://merncrudbackend-1zpv.onrender.com').then(result=>setUsers(result.data)).catch(err=>console.log(err));},[]);const handleDelete=id=>{axios.delete('https://merncrudbackend-1zpv.onrender.com/deleteUser/'+id).then(res=>{window.location.reload();}).catch(err=>console.log(err));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-flex vh-100 bg-primary justify-content-center align-items-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"w-50 bg-white rounded p-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/create",className:"btn btn-success",children:"Add +"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Age"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Action"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:users.map(user=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:user.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:user.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:user.age}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/update/${user._id}`,className:"btn btn-success",children:"Update"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-danger",onClick:e=>handleDelete(user._id),children:"Danger"})]})]},user._id);})})]})]})});};export default Users;
